title: Canyonlands National Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved        Park maintenance employees remove carved graffiti. NPS Photo   Â    Public support is a critical component in the management of National Park Service lands. No other federal agency relies as heavily on the generosity and kindness of its visitors, and we thank you for your past support and look forward to future partnerships.   You can get involved in a variety of ways: volunteering as a campground host, commenting on park management plans, shopping in our bookstores, or joining our friends groups. Take a look at the links below to find out how to get involved at Canyonlands and the other parks in southeast Utah.  NPS Centennial The National Park Service is celebrating its centennial in 2016. Find out how we're celebrating our 100th anniversary, and how we're looking forward to the next 100 years.    Partners Learn about groups that work with the National Park Service to support our mission.    Volunteer Volunteers serve Canyonlands National Park in a variety of ways. Learn how you can help.    Work With Us Look for employment opportunities at Canyonlands.    Do Business With Us Business partners can help visitors connect to Canyonlands. Learn about the Commercial Use Authorization program that allows suitable commercial services to be offered to park visitors.    Planning Comment on park planning documents, and review completed plans and guidance documents.
